resources.string: Please select a chapter from the list to begin\u2026
The app has three sections. Visit each section to see how it works.
This section is for review only. Tap on a Study Note to toggle it.
This section is for basic practise. Tap on a problem to select it..
..now use the buttons to decide if the selected problem statement is correct.
Finally, tap on the problem statement again to see its solution.
This section is for advanced practise. Go ahead and tap on a problem to expand it.
Steps are revealed one-by-one under the problem statement. Select the next step and use ❌ or ✓ to decide if it is correct. As before, tap on a step again to see its solution.
Do you wish to reset all the problems in this chapter so you can try them out again?
